Participation.definition: the action or state of taking part in something
Participation.origin: [a loan made directly or in with a bank]

1.definition: the action or state of taking part in something

sub_terms.a: association with others in a relationship (as a partnership) or an enterprise usually on a formal basis with specified rights and obligations [a loan made directly or in with a bank]

2 a.definition: something in which shares are taken by more than one party

sub_terms.b: something that results in a share (as of a distribution)
